sources.title: The Sea Chase (1955) John Wayne Â· Lana Turner
sources.description: In 1939, a German merchant ship carrying refugees attempts to reach its home port in the North Sea from Sydney. ..

metadata.Plot: As the Second World War breaks out, German freighter captain Karl Ehrlich is about to leave Sydney, Australia with his vessel, the Ergenstrasse. Ehrlich, an anti-Nazi but proud German, hopes to outrun or out-maneuver the British warship pursuing him. Aboard his vessel is Elsa Keller, a woman Ehrlich has been ordered to return to Germany safely along with whatever secrets she carries. When Ehrlich's fiercely Nazi chief officer Kirchner commits an atrocity, the British pursuit becomes deadly.
metadata.Writer: James Warner Bellah, John Twist, Andrew Geer
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Lana Turner, David Farrar
